description:
Light Blue Eau Intense Eau De Parfum - A Mediterranean Masterpiece

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense, an enchanting fragrance that transports you to the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea. This 100ml eau de parfum intensifies the legendary Light Blue essence with a more powerful and seductive character. ‚ú®

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100ml Women Eau De Parfum Intense Dolce & Gabbana

The Exquisite Fragrance Notes of Light Blue Eau Intense

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Lemon, Granny Smith Apple üçè Marigold, Jasmine üå∏ Amber, Musk üí´

Key Features of Light Blue Eau Intense

  • More intense and long-lasting than the original Light Blue
  • Perfect for summer days and warm evenings üåø
  • Sophisticated glass bottle with a frosted blue finish
  • Ideal for best-selling luxury fragrance collectors
  • Created by master perfumer Olivier Cresp

The Light Blue Eau Intense fragrance begins with a vibrant burst of lemon and crisp Granny Smith apple, creating an immediate sensation of Mediterranean freshness. The heart reveals delicate marigold and jasmine, adding a feminine touch to this aquatic composition. The base notes of amber and musk provide a warm, sensual foundation that lingers beautifully on the skin. üî•

The Legacy of Light Blue

Launched in 2017, Light Blue Eau Intense builds upon the iconic success of the original Light Blue fragrance from 2001. Dolce & Gabbana created this new arrival to capture the intense Mediterranean summer, where the sun is at its zenith and the blue sea reflects its light with blinding intensity. This Dolce & Gabbana masterpiece has become a modern classic, loved by women seeking an elegant yet refreshing signature scent. üíé

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Light Blue Eau Intense last compared to the original?

The Light Blue Eau Intense EDP offers significantly improved longevity compared to the original EDT version. While the original Light Blue typically lasts 4-5 hours, the Eau Intense formulation can last 7-9 hours on the skin due to its higher concentration and carefully selected ingredients. The premium fragrance projection is also enhanced, making it perfect for all-day wear without the need for frequent reapplication.

##
short_description:
Dive into the Mediterranean with Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense EDP (100ml). This intensified version combines zesty lemon, crisp apple, delicate jasmine, and sensual musk for a refreshing yet long-lasting feminine fragrance that captures summer's essence in every spray.
